website_summaries.verdict: A more traditional one-button rice cooker that carries the reliability of the Cuckoo brand.
pros: Can handle 3 cups of uncooked rice
Keeps rice warm for 3 days without drying out or burning
A smaller sized rice cooker that is good for 1 or 2 people
cons: This model is only designed as a rice cooker
It does not have the functionality for other foods found with other Cuckoo cookers

customer_reviews.title: Delicious & Tasty Rice
customer_reviews.text: This little thing can make very nice tasty rice. After buying a whole lot of rice cookers and returning them back to Amazon, I finally got this baby. I almost didn’t buy it because it too expensive but I was frustrated with all my buys so I finally bought this and I must say it’s the best thing that I’ve ever bought. The price is way more expensive than other rice cookers but you get value for money. Now am waiting to see how long this baby will last before it starts giving me problems. Hopefully not !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen A

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my rice cooker. I lived in Asia for a year and wanted the most true-to-Asia rice cooker I could find. Amongst all the countries I cooked rice in, the ones in Korea were my favorite. I had to find a Cuckoo and this one was PERFECT. Make sure to get the right voltage to use in the US! I LOVE it! It makes perfect rice. It doesn't leave any residue in the bin afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: WO

customer_reviews.title: Rice was perfect, color was bright and price was awsome Happy
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter She loves it. Rice was perfect, color was bright and price was awsome Happy Hunter
customer_reviews.author: 1Curious Consumer

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended for cooking rice and durability
customer_reviews.text: the last one I bought more than 5 years still works but inside cooking pot got scratched up from abuse and carelessness. highly recommended for cooking rice and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Trojan Horsing Around

customer_reviews.title: Best Rice Cooker Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using another, less expensive, brand of rice cooker for years and years. I decided to splurge on the Cuckoo this time and am now a huge fan and will never use another brand again. So easy to use, cooks up fast, it cleans up easily, and is cute to look at...what could be better? The rice turns out perfect every single time. Do yourself a favor and buy this rice cooker!
customer_reviews.author: Whidbey Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our old one with this one. Much easier to clean and use.
customer_reviews.author: Catrina

customer_reviews.title: Really nice rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Really nice rice cooker. Only has 1 button (cook) so it's very simple to use and the quality is very nice too. The size is adequate and it's perfect for people who dorm in universities.
customer_reviews.author: Da Eun Kang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The warm feature keeps rice ready to eat for at least another day. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rice heaven
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is the best rice cooker I've owned
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is a little smaller than I imagined but for my small family, it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Gloria D. Laurency

customer_reviews.title: Does what it was made to do and well.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rice cooker. Korean engineering and simplicity at it's best. This makes perfect rice and keeps it warm. No more no less. If you're looking for something with bells and whistles or something sleek and pretty, this ain't it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.L

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and cooks rice fast
customer_reviews.text: It’s very easy to use and makes good rice. I like the design and color too. I used to own one that was more expensive and had more functions but I like this one better because I use my rice cooker just to cook rice fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tbird

customer_reviews.title: Sorry!
customer_reviews.text: The reason i took 3 stars off because the manufacture made the inner pot and the measurement numbers are the same color (black) It's cause very very hard to see the number. The other brand that i've used before they make different colors about the inner pot and the measurement numbers for easy to see how much to add water.
customer_reviews.author: Kesar Akkara

customer_reviews.title: So happy! Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd rice cooker! Perfect. I didn't want one with a lot of buttons. Just put rice in, double the water, close, push cook. Done.
customer_reviews.author: Roselyn Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Good rice!
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for the buck on the market. Makes perfect rice every time. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M

customer_reviews.title: As a holiday gift for my friend, she has ...
customer_reviews.text: As a holiday gift for my friend, she has reported that she totally loves this rice cooker and is so excited to use all the functions.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Shaw

customer_reviews.title: It was used
customer_reviews.text: I’m marking this down because it was used. I bought it and didn’t look at it closely until after the return period expired. I expected a new and unopened item. It’s a little too small. Maybe for a couple it’s ok but preparing rice for 4 people is a stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Common Sense

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice EVERY time
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these in Korea and rice was perfect EVERY SINGLE TIME. Only downside to this was the price, in Korea we paid 15$ for the 220V version but this was much more for the 110V version... crushes the insta-pot and all other rice cookers... pricey but well worth it for single button ease of use and perfect rice.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B

customer_reviews.title: Super Happy with Purchase!  Great quality!  Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Super Awesome Product! Keeps my rice warm and fresh for 2 days that I have left rice in it and plugged in. Have had numerous rice cookers in the past and this one is definitely the best. It is also very cute! Super easy to use and clean. Might buy a couple more for Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE NUNGESTER

customer_reviews.title: Makes Consistently Good Rice
customer_reviews.text: I've used it about 30 times and it shows no signs of wear. It's easy to clean makes consistently good rice. I wish the size had been 3 US cups, but I understood that it was Japanese/Korean cup size before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: Cuts my rice making and stress down considerably.... This is so easy to use and clean... Comes out with perfect rice everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and perfect rice every time. build quality is very good.
customer_reviews.author: dogma

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent rice cooker, but it doesn't have a spatula holder.
customer_reviews.author: Ning

customer_reviews.title: Have had a lite trouble with rice not being cooked ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had a lite trouble with rice not being cooked all the way? Have to put a little extra water then marked.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Great size for our use. Very easy to use and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: llp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rice with only a few hundred watts of power and no overflow mess
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful rice cooker, perfect for one or two people. It uses only a few hundred watts so we are able to use it in our mountain cabin electricity from a couple of solar panels and four batteries. Cuckoo has a great feature that if there is liquid overflow it collects in a container on the back of the unit instead of running out onto the counter top or table. Very nice. Other rice cookers just make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sloan

customer_reviews.title: fantastic cooker
customer_reviews.text: Rice does not burn or dry out. Keeps rice warm for three days.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Larson

customer_reviews.title: This rice cooker is Good and easy to used
customer_reviews.text: This rice cooker is really nice and easy to use I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cuckoo CR-0331 Rice Cooker, 3 Cups Uncooked (1.5 Liters / 1.6 Quarts), Orange
product_meta.description: CR-0331 is the classic and traditional rice cooker that is reliable to cook your rice. If you just want to cook rice only then this is the perfect model for you.
